frontmatter.title: Generating random Turkish first names with a super basic RNN
frontmatter.description: Inspired by the mini 'Dinosaur name generator' project I did a while ago, I wanted to re-use the core code (with some modifications and refactorings of my own) and try to generate Turkish first names. The project was about building a simple recurrent neural network using numpy and it was a part of the Sequence Models course of Andrew Ng's awesome Deep Learning Specialization series on Coursera.

frontmatter.title: Enrolling in Andrew Ng's Deep Learning Specialization MOOC for free
frontmatter.description: This year, I enrolled in Andrew Ng's awesome Deep Learning Specialization series consisting of 5 different courses on Coursera; all for free. While chatting with people about this, I realized that people usually don't know to what extend you can make use of the course material when you enroll for free. So I wanted to share my experiences here and I hope it helps someone.

frontmatter.title: Kaggle Munich Meetup
frontmatter.description: Yesterday was my third week in Munich and to join the community of the city's machine learning peeps, I went to Kaggle Munich's meetup, held at the Google office.
